desc: Crystals have been used for their energy properties since ancient times. The personal energy signature you vibrate with influences the experiences, people and situations you attract in your life. Each crystal has a unique structure and healing frequency and it’s this special r

layout.text: Wearing crystal jewelry can raise your vibration and renew your energy, which may transform your health and well-being in pretty miraculous ways. When you allow crystals to touch your skin, especially for a prolonged amount of time like when wearing jewelry, their energy may easily raise your vibration and infuse with your aura.
